guest_info.name: Kim Rittberg
guest_info.title: Social Media Expert
guest_info.specialty: Digital Marketing and Video Content Creation

problems_addressed.solution_summary: Shift mindset from 'supermodel mode' to 'teacher mode' to focus on the message rather than appearance.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Lack of engagement with static content
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Engage more effectively by showing up on video to build trust and relationships.

target_avatars.relevance: New agents often struggle with building a personal brand and may feel intimidated by video content.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Start with Instagram Stories for low-pressure practice and gradually build confidence on camera.

target_avatars.relevance: Intermediate agents may be creating content but not seeing results.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Develop a clear video strategy to enhance content effectiveness and lead generation.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: If you start showing up today, your video might be okay, maybe a little awkward. But tomorrow will be easier.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to take the first step in video marketing by normalizing initial discomfort.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Feeling awkward on camera? Here's why that's perfectly okay.

key_tactics.context: Start posting short, temporary videos to get comfortable with being on camera.
Set up interviews to create engaging video content without the pressure of direct-to-camera speaking.

quotable_insights: Hiding from the camera means hiding from clients.

resources_mentioned.name: Video Boot Camp
resources_mentioned.context: A seven-week live coaching program to help agents get confident on camera and develop a video strategy.

episode_summary: In this episode, Kim Rittberg emphasizes the importance of video in real estate marketing, offering strategies to overcome camera shyness and build a personal brand. She provides actionable tips for using Instagram Stories as a practice tool and highlights the effectiveness of video in building client relationships.
